OOC: I ignored that Cyndro was the Maximals ship so I have to repost.

Alphah:

Alphah took one of their computers and typed something, she cheked 
the maximal signature and noticed Predacons' had arrived to area.

She opened the comm link with Iron Raptor

"Miss Raptor"said Alphah "I have a bad new to give you, Predacons are 
in the same area than the maximal signature, if we don't act soon the 
maximal could be taken prisioner or worse could die"
